itunes:title: August Books on the Radar
title: August Books on the Radar
description:
In Episode 10 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are sharing their August Books on the Radar! They share what they're loving lately, their latest read, a shelf addition, and have book talk about upcoming August releases they are excited to read.

*Support us onÂ PatreonÂ ! We would love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus content including bonus episodes, Zoom get togethers, an engaging private Facebook group to interact with other listeners and more for just $5 a month!Â 

Â *The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!


Loving Lately
1:58 The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid
6:36 AnyList App

Latest Reads
11:31 Lights Out in Lincolnwood |Geoff Rodkey (audio)
13:18 Razorblade Tears | S. A. Cosby (audio)

Book Talk
19:22 Bullet Train | Kotaro Isaka
22:06 Damnation Spring | Ash Davidson
24:13 Ghosts | Dolly Alderton
27:05 In My Dreams I Hold a Knife | Ashley Winstead
29:29 Cul-De-Sac | Joy Fielding
32:34 The Night We Burned | S. F. Kosa
34:20 The Show Girl | Nicola Harrison
36:57 How to Kill Your Best Friend | Lexi Elliott
The French Girl (mentioned)
Her Dark Lies | JT Ellison (mentioned)
39:35 The Last Guests | JP Pomare
42:41 The Guide | Peter Heller
The River | Peter Heller (mentioned)

Shelf Additions
45:29 Never Saw Me Coming | Vera Kurian
48:10 Billy Summers | Stephen King
The Institute | Stephen King (mentioned)
The Outsider | Stephen King (mentioned)
Mr. Mercedes | Stephen King (mentioned)

Love audiobooks like we do? Head to Libro.fm where you can find your next must listen audiobook, gift a membership to someone special, and support your favorite Independent Bookstore! *link is an affiliate in which we earn a small commission at no cost to you

Find us on social media! On Instagram, Tina is at @Tbretc, Renee is at Â @Itsbooktalk, and the podcast is @booktalketc.Â 

You can also email us directly at booktalketc@gmail.com.Â
